Oct. 5, 2013 D West Wales BBA Festival Contest (First Section)
West Wales BBA Festival Contest (First Section) 10 Own Choice Test Piece Contest West Wales BBA Festival Contest west-wales-bba-festival-contest-first-section
None
Burry Port, Carmarthenshire, Wales, UK Best Instrumentalist: Darren Morris (Euphonium, Llwydcoed) Prizes - 1st £200, 2nd £125, 3rd £100. 3 bands competed.
Oct. 6, 2013, 2:28 p.m. July 4, 2020, 12:24 p.m.
1 Llwydcoed Band Nigel Seaman Essay [Gregson]
2 Lewis Merthyr Band Gareth Pritchard Triumphant Rhapsody
3 RAF St. Athan Voluntary Band Alan Bourne Royal Parks
